pkgmetadata.longdescription:
PGObject::Simple is an application-facing library which enables mapping between rows of simple values and application classes. It is simple and easy to use.
In this module, obects are simple blessed hashes, and arguments to mapped functions are mapped by stripping an optional in_ prefix to the argumnet name and then looking for a property of the same name.
If use Moose, use PGObject::Simple::Role instead.
